consensus_framework/
├── pyproject.toml                 # Python packaging configuration
├── setup.py                       # Package installation
├── README.md                      # Documentation
├── LICENSE                        # MIT License
├── .gitignore                     # Git ignore file
├── src/
│   └── consensus_framework/
│       ├── __init__.py            # Package initialization
│       ├── locus_consensus.py     # Core statistical functionality
│       └── bed_consensus_cli.py   # Command-line interface
├── tests/
│   ├── __init__.py                # Test package initialization
│   ├── test_locus_consensus.py    # Tests for core functions
│   └── test_bed_consensus_cli.py  # Tests for CLI functionality
└── docs/
    ├── usage.md                   # Detailed usage instructions
    └── examples/
        └── example_input.tsv      # Example input file
